Detailed Description

GFF_Set: a set of GFF_Feature objects, generally as appear together in a file.

Simply consists of a list of GFF_Feature objects and some optional meta-data extracted from file comments (see http://www.sanger.ac.uk/Software/formats/GFF/GFF_Spec.shtml). NOTE: "type" meta-data is currently ignored
